Author: Lana Turner
Quote: Humor has been the balm of my life, but it's been reserved for those close to me, not part of the public Lana.

Author: Roald Dahl
Quote: So, please, oh please, we beg, we pray, go throw your TV set away, and in its place you can install, a lovely bookcase on the wall.

Author: Victoria Beckham
Quote: I like a man who can be a real friend, has a good sense of humor, a good pair of shoes and a healthy gold card.

Author: John Gerzema
Quote: Transparency, honesty, kindness, good stewardship, even humor, work in businesses at all times.

Author: Tom DeLonge
Quote: Humor has become so cliche and boring that nothing's funny anymore unless it involves something totally disgusting that offends somebody or makes them feel really uncomfortable.

Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote: Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living, it's a way of looking at life through the wrong end of a telescope.

Author: David Augsburger
Quote: Ontologically, chocolate raises profoundly disturbing questions: Does not chocolate offer natural revelation of the goodness of the Creator just as chilies disclose a divine sense of humor? Is the human born with an innate longing for chocolate? Does the notion of chocolate preclude the concept of free will?

Author: Michael Levitt
Quote: I love the Swedish people for their detective novels, their archipelago, their sense of humor, their carbonated vodka, and most especially, for their wonderful hospitality.

Author: Margaret Cho
Quote: Sometimes the only way to deal with horrific things in life is through a dark sense of humor.

Author: Anne Wilson Schaef
Quote: I realize that humor isn't for everyone. It's only for people who want to have fun, enjoy life, and feel alive.

Author: Danny McBride
Quote: Confidence and a good sense of humor can usually win a chick over.

Author: Elmore Leonard
Quote: I would say just start writing. You've got to write every day. Copy someone that you like if you think that perhaps could become your sound, too. I did that with Hemingway, and I thought I was writing just like Hemingway. Then all of a sudden it occurred to me - he didn't have a sense of humor. I don't know anything he's written that's funny.

Author: Justin Halpern
Quote: Although Kurt Vonnegut may not be considered a humor writer, 'Breakfast of Champions' is one of the funniest books I've ever read.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes
Quote: That does it,"said Jace. "I'm going to get you a dictionary for Christmas this year.""Why?"Isabelle said."So you can look up 'fun.' I'm not sure you know what it means.

Author: Colin Quinn
Quote: Everybody's got a different sense of humor. It's just different styles.

Author: Anthony G. Oettinger
Quote: Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies like a banana.

Author: David Rakoff
Quote: I'm not sure. But that bless-his/her-heart kind of melancholic humor is among my favorite things in the world. I guess it exposes a kind of humanity - or that's the hope, at least - a kind of grudging respect for human frailty. Unless it's actually kicking human frailty while it's down - I'm not sure.

Author: Mike Rowe
Quote: The thing that makes 'Dirty Jobs' different is that it's one of the few shows that portrays work in a way that doesn't highlight the drudgery. Instead, it highlights the humor.

Author: Billy Childish
Quote: We are not actually in charge of life, yet behave as if we are the masters of our own destiny. The realization of this fact is quite a hard one. The ridiculousness of our pomposity and presumption can only result in anger or humor.

Author: Ric Ocasek
Quote: I think bands, when they're on the road, they keep their sanity by developing an internal sense of humor.

Author: Tab Hunter
Quote: Rock Hudson wasn't my type. He's a great guy and had a great sense of humor.

Author: Edgar Allan Poe,  Marginalia
Quote: I have great faith in fools - self-confidence my friends will call it.

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person.

Author: Issa Rae
Quote: I hate to say it but I hate black humor. I feel like a Klan member saying it, but it's just not funny.

Author: Mark Twain
Quote: I was gratified to be able to answer promptly, and I did. I said I didn’t know.

Author: Silvio Berlusconi
Quote: I'm not a traditional politician, and I have a sense of humor. I'll try to soften it and become boring, maybe even very boring, but I'm not sure if I'll be able to.

Author: Michelle Monaghan
Quote: I'm not too modest of a person. I've got a pretty blue sense of humor.

Author: Jason Kilar
Quote: My father was an electrical engineer who worked at Westinghouse in Pittsburgh. When I was growing up, my mother wrote humor columns for the local paper. She was the Erma Bombeck of Murrysville, Pa.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: I love to see a young girl go out and grab the world by the lapels. Life's a bitch. You've got to go out and kick ass.

Author: Jeff Dunham
Quote: It's amazing how these little guys can say things that a mortal human could never get away with. There's some sort of unspoken license... when outlandish things come out of an inanimate object, somehow it equals humor.

Author: Ian Frazier
Quote: Russian humor is to adapt or make some sense or nonsense out of the insanity of their lives.

Author: David Lambert
Quote: I'm a big fan of independent girls who are strong-willed, vocal in their opinions, and have a sense of humor.

Author: Zoey Deutch
Quote: One thing my family has shown me is that having a sense of humor is everything.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Quote: Percy wouldn't notice a joke if it danced naked in front of him wearing one of Dobby's hats.

Author: Pam Dawber
Quote: I need to end up with someone who is strong, intelligent, independent, someone I really admire - sensitive, sensuous, warm, a sense of humor.

Author: David Seabury
Quote: Good humor isn't a trait of character, it is an art which requires practice.

Author: Matt Stone
Quote: Even celebrities, most people have a sense of humor. Most of the people we meet who we've done on the show, like it.

Author: Kunal Nayyar
Quote: Sometimes I'll be sitting with my friends; I'll say something Koothrappali-esque and make a face. There is a lot of Koothrappali in me as a human being. A lot of mannerism, humor, mischievousness, my innocence. So I don't know if I bring him home so much as I bring myself to him at work.

Author: Bill Burr
Quote: They say you don't want to meet your heroes, but those two guys, you do want to meet them, because they do not disappoint. Walken has this amazing sense of humor, and Pacino is like just a sweetheart of a guy.

Author: Katie Aselton
Quote: Okay, sense of humor: plus one. Being able to laugh at yourself: plus one. Being able to laugh at other people without being mean: plus one. Vanity: minus one.

Author: Jonny Lee Miller
Quote: I really wouldn't want to live in America. I found New York claustrophobic and dirty. I missed England when I was there, simple things like smells and the British sense of humor.

Author: Josh Bowman
Quote: A good sense of humor will get you everywhere.

Author: Jon Scieszka
Quote: My platform has been to reach reluctant readers. And one of the best ways I found to motivate them is to connect them with reading that interests them, to expand the definition of reading to include humor, science fiction/fantasy, nonfiction, graphic novels, wordless books, audio books and comic books.

Author: Kathy Baker
Quote: I try to give all my characters a sense of humor, so I guess I feel like I have done comedy, but maybe I'm better known for drama.

Author: Ashleigh Banfield
Quote: There's not a lot of other stuff I admire about his content, but there's something about Howard Stern and his perseverance in a very difficult industry. He does tickle me in certain ways with humor.

Author: Bernard Sahlins
Quote: I'm a bug on acting, which distinguishes Second City from a lot of other revues. It comes from the character, the behavior, and not from the jokes. I don't think jokes are funny. Humor comes out of character and out of situations the character is in.

Author: Randall Munroe
Quote: I don't have hard numbers about this, but the impression I get is that the amount of eyeballs you get from being on the humor shelf at Barnes & Noble - it is almost insignificant.

Author: Sam Riley
Quote: I couldn't really take a girl from Berlin to live in Leeds. I love it here. I miss the Yorkshire sense of humor and things like bitter and Yorkshire puddings, but I can still get my hands on salt 'n' vinegar crisps.

Author: Doug TenNapel
Quote: When we go to see comedians or funny movies, they don't address the wall behind them; they face us. This is why a game's first job is to entertain through gameplay and secondarily through humor, drama, or other traditional entertainment devices. The humor has to be a gentleman. I mean, it needs to be squeezed in around the game.

Author: Christopher Egan
Quote: Sense of humor. A girl who doesn't take themselves too seriously. And someone who is spontaneous. They're the three things for me that really attract me to a girl.

Author: Winston S. Churchill
Quote: My tastes are simple: I am easily satisfied with the best.

Author: Drew Fuller
Quote: All I do is have fun. When I'm not working, it's about making people laugh. I love making jokes about things. Even when someone's mad at me, I'll deflect anger with humor. My days are filled with laughter. If I'm not laughing, I'm not happy.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: I think God, in creating man, somewhat overestimated his ability.

Author: Terry Pratchett,  The Last Continent
Quote: It is said that your life flashes before your eyes just before you die. That is true, it's called Life.

Author: Jim Backus
Quote: Magoo's appeal lies in our hostility toward an older generation. But he's not only nearsighted physically. His mind is selective of what it sees, too. That is where the humor, the satire lies, in the difference between what he thinks he sees and reality as we see it.

Author: Isaac Asimov,  Foundation
Quote: Never let your sense of morals prevent you from doing what is right.

Author: Gary Shteyngart
Quote: Without humor, I cannot go on and I doubt many of my readers would go on either. Humor is so important. I am here to have fun here with my work.

Author: Dick Cavett
Quote: I'm sure I've all but lost friends by maintaining that, despite their love for it, I always saw Stanley Kramer's 'It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World' as more of an exercise in anti-comedy than humor.

Author: Emanuel Celler
Quote: Roosevelt's humor was broad, his manner friendly. Of wit there was little; of philosophy, none. What did he possess? Intuition, inspiration, love of adventure.

Author: Jerry Seinfeld
Quote: Nobody enjoys the 'little show about nothing' humor more than me, but that is never the way I look at it.

Author: Margaret Cho
Quote: It's good to be able to laugh at yourself and the problems you face in life. Sense of humor can save you.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Quote: You haven't got a letter on yours,"George observed. "I suppose she thinks you don't forget your name. But we're not stupid-we know we're called Gred and Forge.

Author: Joss Whedon
Quote: Why anybody gets my sense of humor I never know, but I do know that when they do, I keep them as close as I possibly can.

Author: Jim Henson
Quote: My hope still is to leave the world a bit better than when I got here.

Author: Al Franken
Quote: Bob Dole used to be really funny. Barney Frank can be kind of funny. Bob Kerrey has a good sense of humor.

Author: Roseanne Barr
Quote: And, you know, I liked writing humor. Well, I should say, I wanted to write seriously, but it kept turning funny.

Author: George Burns
Quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.

Author: Ice Cube
Quote: Our records, if you have a dark sense of humor, were funny, but our records weren't about comedy. They were about protests, fantasy, confrontation and all that.

Author: Amy Poehler
Quote: Both conservatives and liberals watch 'Parks and Recreation,' and they each think the show is for them, which is really cool. 'SNL' was totally different. It was exciting because everyone was paying attention. Political humor works when people know what you're talking about.

Author: Nina Dobrev
Quote: You either have chemistry or you don't, but a lot of what attracts me is a guy's mind and humor and talent. I need to get to know all those things before I fall for someone.

Author: Warwick Davis
Quote: My parents armed me with an amazing sense of humor, and it's what you need when, well, it's what anyone needs in this world.

Author: Oscar Wilde,  The Importance of Being Earnest
Quote: I never travel without my diary. One should always have something sensational to read in the train.

Author: John Kricfalusi
Quote: Joe Barbera's s always complaining that he can't get humor into cartoons anymore. Just do it. You've got your money. Why do they let the networks run their lives?

Author: P. J. O'Rourke
Quote: Teasing and a sense of humor, if you can develop that in your kids, and if you can exercise it with the kids, just makes for a pleasanter atmosphere.

Author: Marilyn Manson
Quote: The difference between me as Brian Warner or Marilyn Manson is just words. Same personality, sensibility, sense of humor, behavior. He is me.

Author: Paul McCartney
Quote: And I loved Fats Waller. I love his instrumental abilities, his vocal abilities and his sense of humor.

Author: Max Irons
Quote: Kindness and a generous spirit go a long way. And a sense of humor. It's like medicine - very healing.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Blood Promise
Quote: I’d said it before and meant it: Alive or undead, the love of my life was a badass.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Last Song
Quote: Mom says it's because she has PMS.Do you even know what that means?"I'm not a little kid anymore. It means pissed-at- men syndrome

Author: Hank Ketcham
Quote: Anyone in the humor business isn't thinking clearly if he doesn't surround himself with idea people. Otherwise, you settle for mediocrity - or you burn yourself out.

Author: H. L. Mencken
Quote: There are men so philosophical that they can see humor in their own toothaches. But there has never lived a man so philosophical that he could see the toothache in his own humor.

Author: Garrison Keillor
Quote: Humor has to surprise us; otherwise, it isn't funny. It's a death knell for a writer to be labeled a humorist because then it's not a surprise anymore.

Author: Bobby Knight
Quote: And I would be the first to admit that probably, in a lot of press conferences over the time that I have been in coaching, indulging my own sense of humor at press conferences has not been greatly to my benefit.

Author: Douglas Adams,  The Salmon of Doubt: Hitchhiking the Galaxy One Last Time
Quote: The fact that we live at the bottom of a deep gravity well, on the surface of a gas covered planet going around a nuclear fireball 90 million miles away and think this to be normal is obviously some indication of how skewed our perspective tends to be.

Author: Martin Sheen
Quote: Those years on the golf course as a caddie, boy, those people were something. They were vulgar, some were alcoholics, racist, they were very difficult people to deal with. A lot of them didn't have a sense of humor.

Author: Wavy Gravy
Quote: Keep your sense of humor, my friend; if you don't have a sense of humor it just isn't funny anymore.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Quote: Don't talk to me.""Why not?""Because I want to fix that in my memory for ever. Draco Malfoy, the amazing bouncing ferret...

Author: Al Yankovic
Quote: It's hard to force creativity and humor.

Author: Patti Smith
Quote: I have great respect for my parents. I got such beautiful things from both of them. It doesn't mean that we didn't have our rough times, but they were remarkable people who were open-minded, creative and hard-working, and had great senses of humor.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: Investigation?"Isabelle laughed. "Now we're detectives? Maybe we should all have code names.""Good idea,"said Jace. "I shall be Baron Hotschaft Von Hugenstein.

Author: Sarah Hyland
Quote: I'm a sarcastic person, and people don't get my humor sometimes.

Author: Malcolm Muggeridge
Quote: Bad humor is an evasion of reality; good humor is an acceptance of it.

Author: J. Tillman
Quote: My humor is my creativity, and my skepticism is a gift.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: You guessed? You must have been pretty sure, considering you could have killed me.""I was ninety percent sure.""I see,"Clary said. There must have been something in her voice, because he turned to look at her. Her hand cracked across his face, a slap that rocked him back on his heels. He put his hands on his cheek, more in surprise than pain."What the hell was that for?""The other ten percent.

Author: Terry Pratchett
Quote: Stories of imagination tend to upset those without one.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
Quote: Why are they all staring?"demanded Albus as he and Rose craned around to look at the other students."Don’t let it worry you,"said Ron. "It’s me. I’m extremely famous.

Author: Peter Segal
Quote: I think superheroes are heroes with flaws, and in their flaws, there is a sense of humor.

Author: Jandy Nelson
Quote: I do find the sibling connection endlessly fascinating, as I do all family dynamics. I like how siblings seem to create their own parentless mini-civilization within a family, one that has its own laws, myths, language, humor, its own loyalties and treacheries.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Vampire Academy
Quote: Only a true best friend can protect you from your immortal enemies.

Author: Arlo Guthrie
Quote: Basically, I think you need two things to get by in this world: a sense of humor and the ability to laugh when your ego is destroyed.

Author: Stephanie Klein,  Straight Up and Dirty
Quote: Tell the truth, or someone will tell it for you.

Author: Gary Oldman
Quote: People who know me, they know I have a sense of humor, I'm a bit of a joker, a bit of a clown really, and I would love someone to exploit that side of me and send me a romantic comedy.

Author: Nicolas Cage
Quote: I'll speak for myself, but there's a lot of humor to be found in sarcasm and darkness. You talk to any paramedic, they survive by developing a pretty off-kilter sense of humor.

Author: Sloane Crosley
Quote: It's funny. People often compare me to other humor essayists. They're usually quite nice comparisons; I will accept those gladly. But I am always sort of appalled at the idea of being lumped with other, more chick-y female writers. And the truth is probably that neither comparison is accurate.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Lightning Thief
Quote: Deadlines just aren't real to me until I'm staring one in the face.

Author: Ed Sheeran
Quote: Try to find someone with a sense of humor. That's an important thing to have because when you get into an argument, one of the best ways to diffuse it is to be funny. You don't want to hide away from a point, because some points are serious, but you'd rather have a discussion that was a discussion, rather than an argument.

Author: John Green,  Will Grayson, Will Grayson
Quote: Some people have lives; some people have music.

Author: Tanit Phoenix
Quote: I am attracted to intelligence, a witty sense of humor, an adventurous outlook on life and spiritual awareness about one's self and the world.

Author: Lewis Carroll,  Alice in Wonderland
Quote: Begin at the beginning,"the King said, very gravely, "and go on till you come to the end: then stop.

Author: Mark Twain
Quote: Humor must not professedly teach and it must not professedly preach, but it must do both if it would live forever.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Titan's Curse
Quote: Love conquers all,"Aphrodite promised. "Look at Helen and Paris. Did they let anything come between them?""Didn't they start the Trojan War and get thousands of people killed?""Pfft. That's not the point. Follow your heart.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quote: I met Woz when I was 13, at a friend's garage. He was about 18. He was, like, the first person I met who knew more electronics than I did at that point. We became good friends, because we shared an interest in computers and we had a sense of humor. We pulled all kinds of pranks together.

Author: Betty White
Quote: It's your outlook on life that counts. If you take yourself lightly and don't take yourself too seriously, pretty soon you can find the humor in our everyday lives. And sometimes it can be a lifesaver.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.

Author: James Patterson,  Saving the World and Other Extreme Sports
Quote: Basically, I have two speeds.... Hostile or smart-aleck. Your choice.

Author: Lemony Snicket,  The Penultimate Peril
Quote: I suppose I'll have to add the force of gravity to my list of enemies.

Author: Milton Berle
Quote: Laughter is an instant vacation.

Author: e. e. cummings
Quote: The most wasted of all days is one without laughter.

Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote: Think left and think right and think low and think high. Oh, the thinks you can think up if only you try!

Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote: From there to here, and here to there, funny things are everywhere.

Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote: A person without a sense of humor is like a wagon without springs. It's jolted by every pebble on the road.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: What's this?"he demanded, looking from Clary to his companions, as if they might know what she was doing there."It's a girl,"Jace said,recovering his composure. "Surely you've seen girls before, Alec. Your sister Isabelle is one.

Author: Anne Wilson Schaef
Quote: I realize that humor isn't for everyone. It's only for people who want to have fun, enjoy life, and feel alive.

Author: Steven Wright
Quote: Right now I’m having amnesia and déjà vu at the same time. I think I’ve forgotten this before.

Author: Francis Bacon
Quote: Imagination was given to man to compensate him for what he is not; a sense of humor to console him for what he is.

Author: Charles Dickens,  A Christmas Carol
Quote: There is nothing in the world so irresistibly contagious as laughter and good humor.

Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote: If I had no sense of humor, I would long ago have committed suicide.

Author: Douglas Adams,  Life, the Universe and Everything
Quote: The Guide says there is an art to flying", said Ford, "or rather a knack. The knack lies in learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss.

Author: Will Rogers
Quote: Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else.

Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote: Most comedy is based on getting a laugh at somebody else's expense. And I find that that's just a form of bullying in a major way. So I want to be an example that you can be funny and be kind, and make people laugh without hurting somebody else's feelings.

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: Just because you call an electric eel a rubber duck doesn't make it a rubber duck, does it? And God help the poor bastard who decides they want to take a bath with the duckie. (Jace Wayland)

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes
Quote: Mom. I have something to tell you. I’m undead. Now, I know you may have some preconceived notions about the undead. I know you may not be comfortable with the idea of me being undead. But I’m here to tell you that undead are just like you and me … well, okay. Possibly more like me than you.

Author: Langston Hughes
Quote: Like a welcome summer rain, humor may suddenly cleanse and cool the earth, the air and you.

Author: Langston Hughes
Quote: Humor is laughing at what you haven't got when you ought to have it.

Author: Erma Bombeck
Quote: When humor goes, there goes civilization.

Author: Leo Rosten
Quote: Humor is the affectionate communication of insight.

Author: Bil Keane
Quote: We are, in the comics, the last frontier of good, wholesome family humor and entertainment.

Author: Lemony Snicket,  Horseradish
Quote: If writers wrote as carelessly as some people talk, then adhasdh asdglaseuyt[bn[ pasdlgkhasdfasdf.

Author: Doug Larson
Quote: A pun is the lowest form of humor, unless you thought of it yourself.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
Quote: Holey? You have the the whole world of ear-related humor before you, you go for holey?

Author: Edward Albee
Quote: I have a fine sense of the ridiculous, but no sense of humor.

Author: William Arthur Ward
Quote: A well-developed sense of humor is the pole that adds balance to your steps as you walk the tightrope of life.

Author: Bob Hope
Quote: I have seen what a laugh can do. It can transform almost unbearable tears into something bearable, even hopeful.

Author: Bob Hope
Quote: A sense of humor is good for you. Have you ever heard of a laughing hyena with heart burn?

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
Quote: How do you feel, Georgie?"whispered Mrs. Weasley.George's fingers groped for the side of his head."Saintlike,"he murmured."What's wrong with him?"croaked Fred, looking terrified. "Is his mind affected?""Saintlike,"repeated George, opening his eyes and looking up at his brother. "You see...I'm HOLEY, Fred, geddit?

Author: Don Rickles
Quote: You can't study comedy; it's within you. It's a personality. My humor is an attitude.

Author: Mark Twain
Quote: What would men be without women? Scarce, sir...mighty scarce.

Author: Mark Twain
Quote: The secret source of humor is not joy but sorrow; there is no humor in Heaven.

Author: Steven Wright
Quote: Everywhere is within walking distance if you have the time.

Author: Allen Klein
Quote: A little perspective, like a little humor, goes a long way.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Quote: Now, you two – this year, you behave yourselves. If I get one more owl telling me you've – you've blown up a toilet or –""Blown up a toilet? We've never blown up a toilet.""Great idea though, thanks, Mum.

Author: Grenville Kleiser
Quote: Good humor is a tonic for mind and body. It is the best antidote for anxiety and depression. It is a business asset. It attracts and keeps friends. It lightens human burdens. It is the direct route to serenity and contentment.

Author: Alanis Morissette
Quote: In my opinion, I think sarcasm and humor in a song, without turning it into a novelty song, is really charming.

Author: Terry Pratchett,  Lords and Ladies
Quote: If cats looked like frogs we'd realize what nasty, cruel little bastards they are. Style. That's what people remember.

Author: Jeff Foxworthy
Quote: We're all screwed up. And the way Christians mess things up is we act like we've got it going on. And if we would just stay in that place of, 'Hey, we're all screwed up and but for the grace of God, none of us have a shot here.' We need to have a sense of humor about it; that's kind of the way I've always faced my comedy.

Author: William Howard Taft
Quote: If this humor be the safety of our race, then it is due largely to the infusion into the American people of the Irish brain.

Author: Twyla Tharp
Quote: I think a sense of humor will help get a girl out of a dark place.

Author: Steve Irwin
Quote: You know, I'm Australian, and we have got the worst sense of humor. We are cruel to each other.

Author: Michael Caine
Quote: My wife, my daughters, even my grandchildren are funny. You've got to keep a sense of humor because anger destroys you.

Author: John Malkovich
Quote: I don't understand how somebody wouldn't have a sense of humor about themselves.

Author: Denis Leary
Quote: I'm really happy I went to a Catholic school because a lot of the repressive tactics they use make for great senses of humor.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Quote: Oh well... I'd just been thinking, if you had died, you'd have been welcome to share my toilet.

Author: David Lynch
Quote: Humor is very interesting to me. My films are not comedies, but there's comedy in them from time to time, absurdities, just like in real life.

Author: Allen Klein
Quote: Humor can be one of our best survival tools.

Author: Tina Fey,  Bossypants
Quote: Do your thing and don't care if they like it.

Author: Scott Adams
Quote: I love you like a fat kid loves cake!

Author: Allen Klein
Quote: Sometimes it takes ten seconds to see some humor in your dilemmas, sometimes ten years.

Author: Allen Klein
Quote: When we are dealing with death we are constantly being dragged down by the event: Humor diverts our attention and lifts our sagging spirits.

Author: Al Franken
Quote: There is - I mean - I found early in life that righteous indignation is a little off-putting, and so I try to couch it with humor.

Author: Louis C. K.
Quote: I've met a lot of people who've lost their jobs and they still have a sense of humor.

Author: Sinclair Lewis
Quote: There are two insults no human being will endure: that he has no sense of humor, and that he has never known trouble.

Author: Romain Gary
Quote: Humor is an affirmation of dignity, a declaration of man's superiority to all that befalls him.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Hush, Hush
Quote: Say 'provoking' again. Your mouth looks provocative when you do.

Author: Shel Silverstein
Quote: Stand-up comics reflect less of a visual humor and more of a commentary.

Author: Dr. Seuss,  Oh, The Places You'll Go!
Quote: So be sure when you step, Step with care and great tact. And remember that life's A Great Balancing Act. And will you succeed? Yes! You will, indeed! (98 and ¾ percent guaranteed) Kid, you'll move mountains.

Author: Allen Klein
Quote: When you do find humor in trying times, one of the first and most important changes you experience is that you see your perplexing problems in a new way - you suddenly have a new perspective on them.

Author: Kevin Hart
Quote: My daughter doesn't even get my humor. She's like, 'Um, no. I don't get it, Dad. Mmm, no, not that one, Dad.'

Author: Peter Steele
Quote: As far as humor goes, I've always been a very insecure person and I've always wanted to be liked.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Quote: Yeah, Quirrell was a great teacher. There was just that minor drawback of him having Lord Voldemort sticking out of the back of his head!

Author: Douglas Adams,  The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
Quote: Don't Panic.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  It Occurred to Me
Quote: If loving someone is putting them in a straitjacket and kicking them down a flight of stairs, then yes, I have loved a few people.

Author: Lynda Barry
Quote: If I didn't try to eavesdrop on every bus ride I take or look for the humor when I go for a walk, I would just be depressed all the time.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games
Quote: You here to finish me off, Sweetheart?

Author: Denis Leary
Quote: My dad was very much a John Wayne kind of guy, but he was also a great guy, great sense of humor, a real dedicated dad. I don't think he ever missed a hockey game I was in.

Author: J.R. Ward,  Dark Lover
Quote: Welcome to the wonderful world of jealousy, he thought. For the price of admission, you get a splitting headache, a nearly irresistable urge to commit murder, and an inferiority complex. Yippee.

Author: Mark Russell
Quote: Humor is very very risky, particularly for a candidate, unless he's been in so long that it just doesn't matter, and he's not running for president. But it's just that people are so sensitive and so touchy, and you're just going to upset somebody without ever realizing it.

Author: Winston S. Churchill
Quote: History will be kind to me for I intend to write it.

Author: Betty White
Quote: I like bawdy humor. I love bawdy humor, but not dirty humor.

Author: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra,  Don Quixote
Quote: Finally, from so little sleeping and so much reading, his brain dried up and he went completely out of his mind.

Author: Max Frisch
Quote: When you say a friend has a sense of humor do you mean that he makes you laugh, or that he can make you laugh?

Author: Helio Castroneves
Quote: I like people with a good sense of humor, like Jennifer Aniston. She is amazing and is a great actress.

Author: Laurel Lea
Quote: Humor has always been important to me. If there is a shield of faith that you can keep up against difficulties, humor is the Teflon coating.

Author: Dave Pirner
Quote: I'm not 17 anymore. I still have some of the same sort of anger, but I have a sense of humor about it... a sense of being constructive with that anger.

Author: Parker Young
Quote: I've dated girls that aren't, this is gonna sound so horrible, that aren't super smart, but they still are super confident, and that's more what I've been attracted to is the confidence and the sense of humor.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: The meek may inherit the earth, but at the moment it belongs to the conceited. Like me.

Author: Brittany Daniel
Quote: Comedy is so hard to do, so it was very cool to do dead pan humor.

Author: Judith Leiber
Quote: I have a good sense of humor. I think everything we do should have whimsy in it.

Author: Tina Fey,  Bossypants
Quote: Some people say, “Never let them see you cry.” I say, if you’re so mad you could just cry, then cry. It terrifies everyone.

Author: Andrew Hudgins
Quote: There's clearly humor that goes too far and humor that is violative, and we are engaged in our humor in a complex call-and-response with one another. I'm telling you a joke to see if you think that it's funny... but if one of us violates some principle or touches on a particularly tender spot of the other, normally we adjust to that and move on.

Author: Danielle Harris
Quote: I chose to stylize 'Among Friends' and add a dark comedic element because I didn't want to get pigeonholed as a genre director. I have a pretty dark sense of humor and knew that in order to get distribution, I had to do something in the genre for my first time out.

Author: George Carlin
Quote: Fighting for peace is like screwing for virginity.

Author: Daniel J. Goor
Quote: One thing I would say is real cops have real gallows senses of humor and make incredibly funny and inappropriate jokes in the presence of dead people all the time.

Author: Erik von Detten
Quote: In a girl I look for honesty above all, someone who I can carry on a conversation with, someone who has a good sense of humor, someone who's true to herself, and to top it, someone who can get ready for a date in less than ten minutes.

Author: Nelson DeMille
Quote: G.I. humor is similar to cop humor.

Author: Marlee Matlin
Quote: Humor comes in all forms, and everyone has their cup of tea about what makes them laugh. But the day we censor humor is a sad one for sure.

Author: Kristin Cashore,  Graceling
Quote: I'm not going to wear a red dress,"she said."It would look stunning, My Lady,"she called.She spoke to the bubbles gathered on the surface of the water. "If there's anyone I wish to stun at dinner, I'll hit him in the face.

Author: Luke Bryan
Quote: I think 'Country Girl' is one song that can veer into country or hip-hop or rap. You can listen to it and enjoy the humor and the fun in it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  It Occurred to Me
Quote: I consider conversations with people to be mind exercises, but I don't want to pull a muscle, so I stretch a lot. That's why I'm constantly either rolling my eyes or yawning.

Author: Matt Groening
Quote: One of the great things about the Internet is that you can read what everybody has to say about everything. It is fascinating to me, the critiques about humor by people who have no sense of humor.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games
Quote: Yes, frosting. The final defense of the dying.

Author: Marlon Wayans
Quote: Humor helps ease the tension of race and the differences in society. If there wasn't comedy I don't know if Obama could have ever become president.

Author: Kay Robertson
Quote: You have to fight for your marriage, do whatever it takes. The commitment has to be there. And if you don't have a sense of humor, I don't know how anybody makes it.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Hush, Hush
Quote: You possess other people's...bodies."He accepted that statement with a nod."Do you want to possess my body?""I want to do a lot of things to your body, but that's not one of them.

Author: Wallace Shawn
Quote: I don't happen to have a sense of humor personally, so I don't know what's funny about a character... This happens to be a feature of my life generally.

Author: George Carlin
Quote: Have you ever noticed that anybody driving slower than you is an idiot, and anyone going faster than you is a maniac?

Author: Bill Watterson
Quote: Sometimes when I'm talking, my words can't keep up with my thoughts. I wonder why we think faster than we speak. Probably so we can think twice.

Author: Colm Meaney
Quote: I suppose I look for humor in most situations because it humanizes things; it makes a character much more three-dimensional if there's some kind of humor. Not necessarily laugh-out-loud type of stuff, just a sense that there is a humorous edge to things. I do like that.

Author: Barack Obama
Quote: Our brand of democracy is hard. But I can promise that a year from now, when I no longer hold this office, I'll be right there with you as a citizen - inspired by those voices of fairness and vision, of grit and good humor and kindness that have helped America travel so far.

Author: Arthur Conan Doyle
Quote: It is a great thing to start life with a small number of really good books which are your very own.

Author: P. J. O'Rourke
Quote: I think that humor has become a principle means of communication among Americans about politics.

Author: Will Rogers
Quote: Even if you are on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: What are all these?"Clary asked."Vials of holy water, blessed knives, steel and silver blades,"Jace said, piling the weapons on the floor beside him, "electrum wire - not much use at the moment but it's always good to have spares - silver bullets, charms of protetion, crucifixes, stars of David-""Jesus,"said Clary"I doubt he'd fit.""Jace."Clary was appalled.

Author: Mitt Romney
Quote: I have five boys in the family, and it's constant competition, sport, humor, and practical jokes.

Author: Jonathan Swift
Quote: Men are happy to be laughed at for their humor, but not for their folly.

Author: Cassandra Clare
Quote: So when the moon's only partly full, you only feel a little wolfy?""You could say that.""Well, you can go ahead and hang your head out the car window if you feel like it.""I'm a werewolf, not a golden retriever.

Author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette
Quote: Total absence of humor renders life impossible.

Author: Tamora Pierce,  Melting Stones
Quote: Every now and then I like to do as I'm told, just to confuse people.

Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
Quote: No mind is thoroughly well organized that is deficient in a sense of humor.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Quote: He was my mum and dad's best friend. He's a convicted murderer, but he's broken out of wizard prison and he's on the run. He likes to keep in touch with me, though...keep up with my news...check if I'm happy...

Author: Groucho Marx
Quote: From the moment I picked up your book until I put it down, I was convulsed with laughter. Some day I intend reading it.

Author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
Quote: People of humor are always in some degree people of genius.

Author: Sandra Bullock
Quote: Poop humor is fun. If you do the toilet scenes well and commit to them, they can be really, really powerful.

Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote: Today was good. Today was fun. Tomorrow is another one.

Author: Jeaniene Frost,  Halfway to the Grave
Quote: I'm saying that I'm a moody, insecure, narrow-minded, jealous, borderline homicidal bitch, and I want you to promise me that you're okay with that, because it's who I am, and you're what I need.

Author: Jessamyn West
Quote: A taste for irony has kept more hearts from breaking than a sense of humor, for it takes irony to appreciate the joke which is on oneself.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: Your friend's poetry is terrible,"he said.Clary blinked, caught momentarily off guard. "What?""I said his poetry was terrible. It sounds like he ate a dictionary and started vomiting up words at random.

Author: Lou Holtz
Quote: The problem with having a sense of humor is often that people you use it on aren't in a very good mood.

Author: Terry Pratchett,  Small Gods
Quote: Time is a drug. Too much of it kills you.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes
Quote: I'll just have them change the entry in the demonology textbook from 'almost extinct' to 'not extinct enough for Alec. He prefers his monsters really, really extinct.' Will that make you happy?

Author: Peter Ustinov
Quote: Comedy is simply a funny way of being serious.

Author: Bill Nye
Quote: Humor is everywhere in that there's irony in just about anything a human does.

Author: Clive James
Quote: Common sense and a sense of humor are the same thing, moving at different speeds. A sense of humor is just common sense, dancing.

Author: James Thurber
Quote: Humor is a serious thing. I like to think of it as one of our greatest earliest natural resources, which must be preserved at all cost.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Quote: Of all the trees we could've hit, we had to get one that hits back.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Quote: Why were you lurking under our window?""Yes - yes, good point, Petunia! What were you doing under our windows, boy?""Listening to the news,"said Harry in a resigned voice.His aunt and uncle exchanged looks of outrage."Listening to the news! Again?""Well, it changes every day, you see,"said Harry.

Author: Madonna
Quote: I'm tough, I'm ambitious, and I know exactly what I want. If that makes me a bitch, okay.

Author: Bill Hicks
Quote: It's always funny until someone gets hurt. Then it's just hilarious.

Author: Mark Twain
Quote: When I was a boy of 14, my father was so ignorant I could hardly stand to have the old man around. But when I got to be 21, I was astonished at how much the old man had learned in seven years.

Author: Dr. Seuss,  One Fish, Two Fish, Red Fish, Blue Fish
Quote: From there to here, from here to there, funny things are everywhere!

Author: Mark Twain
Quote: Everything human is pathetic. The secret source of humor itself is not joy but sorrow. There is no humor in heaven.

Author: Jennifer Jones
Quote: If you could choose one characteristic that would get you through life, choose a sense of humor.

Author: Allen Klein
Quote: Humor does not diminish the pain - it makes the space around it get bigger.

Author: A.A. Milne,  Winnie-the-Pooh
Quote: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.

Author: Christopher Paolini
Quote: Because you can't argue with all the fools in the world. It's easier to let them have their way, then trick them when they're not paying attention.

Author: George Eliot
Quote: Different taste in jokes is a great strain on the affections.

Author: Mignon McLaughlin
Quote: A sense of humor is a major defense against minor troubles.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: It's not gray,"Clary felt compelled to point out. "It's green.""If there was such a thing as terminal literalism, you'd have died in childhood,"said Jace.

Author: George Carlin
Quote: That's why they call it the American Dream, because you have to be asleep to believe it.

Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quote: You are not angry with people when you laugh at them. Humor teaches tolerance.

Author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Hobbit
Quote: Do you wish me a good morning, or mean that it is a good morning whether I want it or not; or that you feel good this morning; or that it is a morning to be good on?

Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote: What's the good of living if you don't try a few things?

Author: Dorothy Parker
Quote: Beauty is only skin deep, but ugly goes clean to the bone.

Author: Frank A. Clark
Quote: I think the next best thing to solving a problem is finding some humor in it.

Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quote: Nothing like a little judicious levity.

Author: Margaret Thatcher
Quote: It's a funny old world.

Author: David Hyde Pierce
Quote: Sometimes in the most tragic situation, something just profoundly funny happens.

Author: Jack Benny
Quote: Gags die, humor doesn't.

Author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Obsidian
Quote: Beautiful face. Beautiful body. Horrible attitude. It was the holy trinity of hot boys.

Author: Mo Willems,  Goldilocks and the Three Dinosaurs

Magnus growled. The growl sounded like "Get out.

Quote: We take the shortest route to the puck and arrive in ill humor.

Author: Jarod Kintz

Author: George Carlin
Quote: If you try to fail, and succeed, which have you done?

Author: Terry Pratchett,  Reaper Man

Author: Melinda Clarke

Author: George Carlin

Author: Alfred Hitchcock

Author: Anne Lamott

Author: Lee Atwater

Author: George Carlin
Quote: Meow” means “woof” in cat.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Author: Rick Riordan

Author: Rita Rudner
Quote: There are different kinds of humor, some is sarcastic, some introspective. Introspective fit my personality better.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: I have a high pain threshold. In fact, it's more of a large and tastfully decorated foyer than a threshold. But I do get easily bored

Author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars
Quote: I told Augustus the broad outline of my miracle: diagnosed with Stage IV thyroid cancer when I was thirteen. (I didn’t tell him that the diagnosis came three months after I got my first period. Like: Congratulations! You’re a woman. Now die.)

Author: Carol Burnett
Quote: Everybody I know who is funny, it's in them. You can teach timing, or some people are able to tell a joke, though I don't like to tell jokes. But I think you have to be born with a sense of humor and a sense of timing.

Author: Robert Benchley
Quote: Opera is when a guy gets stabbed in the back and, instead of bleeding, he sings.

Author: Mark Twain
Quote: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence; then success is sure.

Author: David Quammen
Quote: On April 3, 2014, Jane Goodall turned 80. The iconic blond ponytail has gone gray, but the sparkle of intelligence, sly humor, and fierce dedication still shines from her hazel eyes.

Author: Douglas Adams,  The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
Quote: Space is big. You just won't believe how vastly, hugely, mind-bogglingly big it is. I mean, you may think it's a long way down the road to the chemist's, but that's just peanuts to space.

Author: Catherine Deneuve
Quote: A woman has to be intelligent, have charm, a sense of humor, and be kind. It's the same qualities I require from a man.

Author: Stephenie Meyer,  Breaking Dawn
Quote: Hey, Rosalie? Do you know how to drown a blonde? Stick a mirror to the bottom of a pool.

Author: David Lynch
Quote: Absurdity is what I like most in life, and there's humor in struggling in ignorance. If you saw a man repeatedly running into a wall until he was a bloody pulp, after a while it would make you laugh because it becomes absurd.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  I Want
Quote: I want to write my own eulogy, and I want to write it in Latin. It seems only fitting to read a dead language at my funeral.

Author: H.L. Mencken
Quote: The older I grow, the more I distrust the familiar doctrine that age brings wisdom.

Author: John Green,  Paper Towns
Quote: As long as we don't die, this is gonna be one hell of a story.

Author: Priscilla Presley
Quote: As a person, he was wonderful. He really was a great person. He was full of life. He had a great sense of humor. Very talented, of course, but very caring to his parents. There was a very endearing quality about Elvis.

Author: Lemony Snicket,  Horseradish
Quote: If an optimist had his left arm chewed off by an alligator, he might say in a pleasant and hopeful voice, "Well this isn't too bad, I don't have a left arm anymore but at least nobody will ever ask me if I'm left-handed or right-handed,"but most of us would say something more along the lines of, "Aaaaaa! My arm! My arm!

Author: Coco Chanel
Quote: You live but once; you might as well be amusing.

Author: Tom Bodett
Quote: Somebody says, 'Do a Tom Bodett, a folksy kind of thing,' and it sounds like something out of 'Hee Haw,' very insulting. They turn wry humor into disparaging sarcasm, and you get what amounts to insulting advertising.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut
Quote: Laughter and tears are both responses to frustration and exhaustion. I myself prefer to laugh, since there is less cleaning do to do afterward.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: I like men who have a future and women who have a past.

Author: Veronica Roth,  Divergent

Author: Bret Michaels
Quote: My life is part humor, part roses, part thorns.

Author: Flannery O'Connor
Quote: Everywhere I go I'm asked if I think the university stifles writers. My opinion is that they don't stifle enough of them. There's many a best-seller that could have been prevented by a good teacher.

Author: Stephanie Perkins,  Anna and the French Kiss
Quote: French name, English accent, American school. Anna confused.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: And next time you're planning to injure yourself to get me attention, just remember that a little sweet talk works wonders.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: And next time you're planning to injure yourself to get me attention, just remember that a little sweet talk works wonders.

Author: Anne Hathaway
Quote: Kindness is really important to me in finding my own prince - so are patience and a sense of humor. Without those qualities he's no Prince Charming!

Author: Groucho Marx,  Groucho and Me

Author: Joaquin Phoenix
Quote: I have this horrible sense of humor where I think discomfort is funny - partly because I experience discomfort a lot, and it's a way of laughing at it and getting a release.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: The world is a stage and the play is badly cast.

Author: Monica Lewinsky
Quote: I think probably the qualities that I look for in a man are somewhat different than they were before I became a public person, but not that much different. I think that, sort of, the element of trust is certainly much bigger for me, but the other things that - the other qualities, intelligence and kindness and sense of humor, those things.

Author: William Goldman,  The Princess Bride
Quote: Just because you're beautiful and perfect, it's made you conceited.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes
Quote: As long as there was coffee in the world, how bad could things be?

Author: William Makepeace Thackeray
Quote: Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society.

Author: Terry Pratchett,  Good Omens: The Nice and Accurate Prophecies of Agnes Nutter, Witch
Quote: God does not play dice with the universe; He plays an ineffable game of His own devising, which might be compared, from the perspective of any of the other players [i.e. everybody], to being involved in an obscure and complex variant of poker in a pitch-dark room, with blank cards, for infinite stakes, with a Dealer who won't tell you the rules, and who smiles all the time.

Author: Jim Butcher,  Blood Rites
Quote: Are you always a smartass?'Nope. Sometimes I'm asleep.

Author: Patch Adams
Quote: Humor is an antidote to all ills.

Author: James Patterson,  The Angel Experiment
Quote: Man, you weigh a freaking ton,"he told me. "What've you been eating, rocks?""Why, is your head missing some?"I croaked. His mouth almost quirked in a smile, and that's when I knew how upset he'd been

Author: Jon Scieszka
Quote: Expand the definition of 'reading' to include non-fiction, humor, graphic novels, magazines, action adventure, and, yes, even websites. It's the pleasure of reading that counts; the focus will naturally broaden. A boy won't read shark books forever.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Fallen Angels
Quote: It’s fascinating. You know all these words, and they’re all English, but when you string them together into sentences, they just don’t make any sense.

Author: Cassandra Clare

Author: Cornelia Funke,  Inkspell

Author: Woody Allen
Quote: To you, I'm an atheist.To God, I'm the loyal opposition.

Author: Christopher Paolini,  Eragon
Quote: People have an annoying habit of remembering things they shouldn't.

Author: Dr. Seuss,  Fox in Socks
Quote: When beetles fight these battles in a bottle with their paddles and the bottle's on a poodle and the poodle's eating noodles......they call this a muddle puddle tweetle poodle beetle noodle bottle paddle battle.

Author: Campbell Scott
Quote: If you're playing a good guy, you show some darkness. If you're playing a dark guy, you show something different, like humor, that will mix it up and hopefully surpass the audience's expectations. What I'm battling all the time is complacency in the audience. I try to bring a little mystery to what might happen because that engages people more.

Author: Carolyn G. Heilbrun
Quote: A literary academic can no more pass a bookstore than an alcoholic can pass a bar.

Author: Bob Newhart

Author: Sylvia Plath,  The Bell Jar

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

One simple test: Check whether the thing that’s glaring at you has got legs. If it has, it’s safe to look into its eyes, although if it really is You-Know-Who, that’s still likely to be the last thing you ever do.

Author: Bill Cosby

Author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

Author: George Carlin
Quote: Men are from Earth, women are from Earth. Deal with it.

Author: James Gray

Author: Richelle Mead,  Bloodlines

Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: If the facts don't fit the theory, change the facts.

Author: Harvey Pekar

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Quote: Harry, don't go picking a row with Malfoy, don't forget, he's a prefect now, he could make life difficult for you...""Wow, I wonder what it'd be like to have a difficult life?"said Harry sarcastically.

Author: Katy Perry

Author: Marilyn Monroe
Quote: What do I wear in bed? Why, Chanel No. 5, of course

Author: Bonnie Raitt

They taught me how to see it with a grain of salt and a lot of humor and perspective.

Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote: I think I've discovered the secret of life -- you just hang around until you get used to it.

Author: Edmund Hillary

Author: Delroy Lindo

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Lightning Thief

Author: Inga Muscio
Quote: I have a really dark, rich, thick sense of humor.

Author: Lily Tomlin

Author: Dorothy Parker,  Enough Rope

Author: Terry Pratchett,  Night Watch

Author: Carrie Preston

Author: Julie Kagawa,  The Iron King

Author: Patrick Wilson

Author: Garrison Keillor

Author: Garry Trudeau

Author: Mark Twain

Author: Maira Kalman

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
Quote: We did it, we bashed them wee Potter's the one, and Voldy's gone moldy, so now let's have fun!

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: Going round and around inside a dryer can be fatal, whereas pasta is rarely fatal. Unless Isabelle makes it.

Author: Eliza Coupe

Author: David Zucker

Author: Suzanne Collins,  Catching Fire

Author: David Sedaris,  When You Are Engulfed in Flames

Author: Robert Mankoff

Author: Steve Martin

Author: Billy Gardell

Author: Stephenie Meyer,  Breaking Dawn
Quote: Life sucks, and then you die...

Author: Kate Clinton

Author: Steven Moffat

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes
Quote: I don't do what I'm told, but I might do what you want if you ask me nicely.

Author: Jason O'Mara
Quote: A sense of humor saves your life, and being able to make friends wherever you go.

Author: Janet Evanovich,  Seven Up

Author: Tom Robbins
Quote: Disbelief in magic can force a poor soul into believing in government and business.

Author: Christopher Heyerdahl

Author: Brandon Sanderson,  Alcatraz Versus the Evil Librarians

Author: Lee Atwater

In those early days, I developed the skills that gave me a certain degree of success in American politics.

Author: Russell Peters

Author: Ambrose Bierce
Quote: The covers of this book are too far apart.

Author: Carol Bartz

Author: A.A. Milne

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

Author: Jarod Kintz,  I Want
Quote: I want to meet a guy named Art. I'd take him to a museum, hang him on the wall, criticize him, and leave.

Author: Cheryl Hines
Quote: I was a little shocked at how adult some of the humor was, because I was never that into animation before and when I watched 'Shrek' I really laughed out loud.

Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote: Sometimes you just have to pee in the sink.

Author: Lauren Myracle,  ttfn

Author: Andrew Scott
Quote: I find any sort of acting that doesn't have any humor in it is mind-numbingly boring.

Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote: I ask people why they have deer heads on their walls. They always say because it's such a beautiful animal. There you go. I think my mother is attractive, but I have photographs of her.

Author: Samantha Shannon
Quote: Rowling is a luminous storyteller. I love her sense of humor and the intricate wizarding world she built around Hogwarts. I think all writers aspire to be like her, to capture readers like she does. But I didn't think about 'Harry Potter' when I wrote 'The Bone Season.'

Author: Jeaniene Frost,  This Side of the Grave
Quote: Ask me if I sparkle and I’ll kill you where you stand.” (Bones)

Author: Mark Twain

Author: Joseph Heller

Author: D.J. MacHale,  The Quillan Games

Author: Christine Ebersole

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: There are only two kinds of people who are really fascinating: people who know absolutely everything, and people who know absolutely nothing.

Author: Stephen King,  Bag of Bones

Author: Ian Frazier

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes
Quote: Watching Jace hug Isabelle, she tried to school her features into a happy and loving expression."Are you all right?"Simon asked, with some concern. "Your eyes are crossing.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Lost Souls

Author: G.K. Chesterton
Quote: I am not absentminded. It is the presence of mind that makes me unaware of everything else.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Sea of Monsters

Author: Jerry Seinfeld

Author: Roy Blount, Jr.

Author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska
Quote: Y'all smoke to enjoy it. I smoke to die.

Author: John Irving,  The Hotel New Hampshire
Quote: You've got to get obsessed and stay obsessed.

Author: James Dashner,  The Maze Runner
Quote: You are the shuckiest shuck faced shuck in the world!

Author: William Goldman,  The Princess Bride
Quote: Inconceivable!""You keep using that word. I do not think it means what you think it means.

Author: Taran Killam
Quote: I think that it's hard for vain people to be funny. I think you can look any way you want as long as you have a good sense of humor about yourself. People who are concerned with their looks and what they're wearing and how they present themselves tend to have less of a sense of humor about themselves.

Author: Anne Lamott
Quote: You can safely assume you've created God in your own image when it turns out that God hates all the same people you do.

Author: Stephenie Meyer,  Breaking Dawn
Quote: You nicked-named my daughter after the Lock Ness Monster!

Author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars
Quote: Look, let me just say it: He was hot. A nonhot boy stares at you relentlessly and it is, at best, awkward and, at worst, a form of assault. But a hot boy . . . well.

Author: Lynn Shelton
Quote: Although humor is present in every one of my films, it has always been used as a way to make the darker, heavier stuff in my stories more palatable. I never set out to make 'Humpday' a comedy.

Author: Lewis Carroll,  Alice's Adventures in Wonderland & Through the Looking-Glass
Quote: Why it's simply impassible!Alice: Why, don't you mean impossible?Door: No, I do mean impassible. (chuckles) Nothing's impossible!

Author: Mark Twain,  Pudd'nhead Wilson and Other Tales
Quote: April 1. This is the day upon which we are reminded of what we are on the other three hundred and sixty-four.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Mark of Athena
Quote: Hercules,huh? Percy frowned. "That guy was like the Starbucks of Ancient Greece. Everywhere you turn--there he is.

Author: Tessa Dare,  A Lady of Persuasion
Quote: Oh no. Don't smile. You'll kill me. I stop breathing when you smile.

Author: Tony Visconti
Quote: My dad's sense of humor was direct and sometimes surreal - his quick wit is well known amongst our family and friends. He raised me on Spike Jones records and W.C. Fields movies, and his sense of humor fell somewhere in between.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut
Quote: To be is to do - SocratesTo do is to be - SartreDo Be Do Be Do - Sinatra

Author: David Sedaris
Quote: Everyone looks retarded once you set your mind to it.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  Good Omens: The Nice and Accurate Prophecies of Agnes Nutter, Witch
Quote: It may help to understand human affairs to be clear that most of the great triumphs and tragedies of history are caused, not by people being fundamentally good or fundamentally bad, but by people being fundamentally people.

Author: A.A. Milne
Quote: Oh Tigger, where are your manners?""I don’t know, but I bet they’re having more fun than I am.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Quote: Mistletoe,"said Luna dreamily, pointing at a large clump of white berries placed almost over Harry's head. He jumped out from under it. "Good thinking,"said Luna seriously. "It's often infested with nargles.

Author: Mike Huckabee
Quote: I was a timid little guy when I was a kid. I used humor as a defense; I became the class clown. But deep inside, I felt real vulnerable.

Author: Lewis Carroll
Quote: Alice laughed. 'There's no use trying,' she said. 'One can't believe impossible things.'I daresay you haven't had much practice,' said the Queen. 'When I was your age, I always did it for half-an-hour a day. Why, sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast. There goes the shawl again!

Author: Barbara Park
Quote: My senior year of high school, I was voted 'Wittiest.' So, several years later, I decided to try my hand at writing humor to see if I could be witty enough to make some money.

Author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray
Quote: Humanity takes itself too seriously. It is the world's original sin. If the cave-man had known how to laugh, History would have been different.

Author: Michael J. Fox
Quote: My view of life is colored by humor and looking at the best in any situation.

Author: Charlaine Harris,  Club Dead
Quote: You are speaking of my future lover. Be more respectful.

Author: George Carlin
Quote: May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Quote: I dreamed I was buying new shoes last night,"said Ron. "What d'ya think that's gonna mean?""Probably that you're going to be eaten by a giant marshmallow or something,"said Harry.

Author: Michael Moore
Quote: I've been encouraging documentary filmmakers to use more and more humor, and they're loath to do that because they think if it's a documentary it has to be deadly serious - it has to be like medicine that you're supposed to take. And I think it's what keeps the mass audience from going to documentaries.

Author: Sophie Kinsella,  Confessions of a Shopaholic
Quote: I love new clothes. If everyone could just wear new clothes everyday, I reckon depression wouldn’t exist anymore.

Author: Steve Carell
Quote: I don't think of myself as funny - I don't fill up a room with my humor... I would fail miserably as a stand-up comedian.

Author: Christopher Moore,  Practical Demonkeeping
Quote: If you think anyone is sane you just don't know enough about them.

Author: Lady Gaga
Quote: Well, that's your opinion, isn't it? And I'm not about to waste my time trying to change it.

Author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska
Quote: I hated sports. I hated sports, and I hated people who played them, and I hated people who watched them, and I hated people who didn't hate people who watched or played them.

Author: Don Rickles
Quote: Among my friends, I'm not a little Boy Scout, and they love my humor, thank God.

Author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska
Quote: The Colonel led all the cheers.Cornbread!"he screamed.CHICKEN!"the crowd responded.Rice!"PEAS!"And then, all together: "WE GOT HIGHER SATs."Hip Hip Hip Hooray!"the Colonel cried.YOU'LL BE WORKIN' FOR US SOMEDAY!

Author: Kurt Vonnegut
Quote: 1492. As children we were taught to memorize this year with pride and joy as the year people began living full and imaginative lives on the continent of North America. Actually, people had been living full and imaginative lives on the continent of North America for hundreds of years before that. 1492 was simply the year sea pirates began to rob, cheat, and kill them.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I can tell if two people are in love by how they hold each other’s hands, and how thick their sanitation gloves are.

Author: Marlee Matlin
Quote: I personally have dealt with any adversity in my life with humor. That's why I told America to 'Read my hips!' on 'Dancing With the Stars' or was happy to play along with Jason Alexander and Jerry Seinfeld in the great restaurant scene on 'Seinfeld.'

Author: Woody Allen
Quote: God is silent. Now if only man would shut up.

Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote: In wine there is wisdom, in beer there is Freedom, in water there is bacteria.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  The Intern
Quote: Those sweet lips. My, oh my, I could kiss those lips all night long.Good things come to those who wait.

Author: Orson Welles
Quote: My doctor told me to stop having intimate dinners for four. Unless there are three other people.

Author: Jon Stewart
Quote: Yes, reason has been a part of organized religion, ever since two nudists took dietary advice from a talking snake.

Imagine, stripping a woman down, and she has a body like a little submarine. With periscope, propellers, torpedoes. That would be the one for me. I'd marry her right off and be faithful to the end.

I read a lot of books.

Youʹre the one whoʹs been doling out C4.ʺʺYou make it sound so easy,ʺ he said with a frown. ʺThat stuffʹs hard to get a hold of.
